all.title: Yahtzee Leaderboard
all.desc: Our Yahtzee contest runs all weekend. See if you can make the highest score.
all.howto: To be eligible for a prize, players must register with Givers & Gamers. Details are available on our leaderboard page.

all.title: PlayStation 5 raffle
all.howto: Purchase a chance to win a PlayStation 5 console. Visit rmhcbluegrass.org/rmhcps5 to enter.

day1.title: RMHC Staff Trivia
day1.desc: Find out which RMHC Staffer knows the most about the House and its mission.

day1.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Arena of Generosity
day1.desc: Adventurers must use their weapons, wizardry and wits to survive this gladitorial spectacle. Viewers will be called upon to help tip the odds in the adventurers' favor.
day1.howto: Top fundraisers are eligible to play. Contact donald@kyfrieddice.com if interested. Visit Roll20 to create an account, and return at game time to play. Game is limited to 5 players.

day2.title: Learn to Play: Yahtzee
day2.desc: Join an experienced player on a Zoom call, where you'll learn or refresh the rules while playing a non-competitive game.

day2.title: Dungeons & Dragons: ⋆★Celebrity Edition★⋆
day2.desc: Activate your donor network to help our celebrity players serve those in need.

day2.title: Golf With Your Friends Invitational
day2.desc: Watch our streamer guests do their best on some increasingly difficult miniature golf holes.

day2.title: Countdown Trivia
day2.desc: A single-elimination, last contestant standing trivia showdown.
day2.howto: Advance registration is required. Questions are answered in a browser on your touchscreen device. You'll receive a URL just before the contest begins.

day2.title: Codenames
day2.desc: Spymasters must help their team discover the right cards using single-word clues.
day2.howto: Game begins after trivia concludes. Play online at codenames.game with the "room code" shown on the Twitch stream. Join us on Zoom to discuss the clues.

day3.title: Family-friendly Jackbox
day3.howto: Visit jackbox.tv, and enter the "room code" shown on the Twitch stream. Join the silliness on Zoom

day3.title: Fall Guys
day3.desc: Hordes of contestants make a wild dash through round after round of escalating chaos until one victor remains.
day3.howto: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout is available as a one-time purchase (currently $20) for computer via Steam or through the PlayStation Store for PS4 and PS5. (Speaking of PS5, have you heard about our raffle?) Share in the chaos on Zoom.

day3.title: Closing Ceremony, Raffle Drawing & Awards
day3.desc: We'll recognize our fundraising stars and prize winners while celebrating our fundraising total.
